about.title: Creativity for All
about.body: We bring students from all disciplines and backgrounds together to work on technical & creative projects.

about.title: Welcome to Our Lab
about.body: Just some UCLA kids with skills in dev, design, and project management trying to make something cool, together. We were founded on the dream that with the right group of people, any idea can come to life.

projects.title: Spring 2020
projects.body: Completed projects during our very first virtual quarter.

projects.title: Fall 2020
projects.body: Start the new school year by joining one of our brand new projects.
